tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_profile (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name STRING,
  birth_date DATE,
  gender STRING,
  address STRING,
  phone_number STRING,
  medical_imaging_data JSON,
  electronic_health_records JSON
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE ImagingData (
    imaging_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    imaging_type VARCHAR(50),
    imaging_date DATE,
    imaging_results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    visit_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  blood_type VARCHAR(5)
);

CREATE TABLE imaging_data (
  imaging_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES medical_records(patient_id),
  imaging_date DATE,
  imaging_type VARCHAR(50),
  imaging_results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES medical_records(patient_id),
  physician_id UUID REFERENCES physicians(physician_id),
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  appointment_reason TEXT
);
